_comment: Audit CI Configuration for Robotics & Control Ltd Security Pipeline
_description: This configuration will FAIL builds on critical vulnerabilities and allow limited high/moderate vulnerabilities

_ci_configuration._usage: npm run security:ci:gate will fail build on threshold violations
_ci_configuration._local_dev: Use npm run security:scan for non-blocking local development scans

_thresholds_explanation.critical: 0 - Any critical vulnerability fails the build
_thresholds_explanation.high: 2 - More than 2 high severity vulnerabilities fails the build
_thresholds_explanation.moderate: 5 - More than 5 moderate vulnerabilities fails the build
_thresholds_explanation.low: 20 - More than 20 low vulnerabilities fails the build
